body_html:
1. In parse_record_fn, use:
    a = tf.sparse_tensor_to_dense(features['a'])
    instead of:
    a = features['a'].
  2. dataset = dataset.map(parse_record_fn).padded_batch(batch_size, padded_shapes=padded_shapes)

These help me

body:
1. In parse_record_fn, use:
a = tf.sparse_tensor_to_dense(features['a'])
instead of:
a = features['a'].
2. dataset = dataset.map(parse_record_fn).padded_batch(batch_size, padded_shapes=padded_shapes)

These help me
